com.xfy.scrolllayout

类 BaseTwoChildrenAdapter<V extends android.view.View>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xfy.scrolllayout.BaseTwoChildrenAdapter<V>
  • 类型参数:
    V - 类中必须有public并且有且只有Context参数的构造方法
    所有已实现的接口:
    TwoChildrenAdapter<V>

    public abstract class BaseTwoChildrenAdapter<V extends android.view.View>
extends java.lang.Object
implements TwoChildrenAdapter<V>
    子类只需实现TwoChildrenAdapter.bindViewData(View, View)

      • cloneFirstView

        public V cloneFirstView(ScrollLayout parent,
                        V first)
        通过第一个子view克隆一个新的View
        指定者:
        cloneFirstView 在接口中 TwoChildrenAdapter<V extends android.view.View>
        参数:
        first - child in ScrollLayout
        返回:
        new child like first child

      • cloneSecondView

        public V cloneSecondView(ScrollLayout parent,
                         V second)
        通过第二个子view克隆一个新的View
        指定者:
        cloneSecondView 在接口中 TwoChildrenAdapter<V extends android.view.View>
        参数:
        second - child in ScrollLayout
        返回:
        new child like second child
